about_the_game:
This time you will be thrown into a Christmas story. Meet and make friends with many magical creatures, explore Santa’s factory, save Christmas and enjoy the spirit of the holiday! There is an exciting adventure waiting for you in our new game! You will have to deal with what stands against the holiday spirit by solving numerous puzzles and searching for items, playing your favorite hidden object scenes! Gather your wits for an unforgettable detective story in this pulse-pounded new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

This Collector's Edition includes:

Make choices and change and choose your end of the story!
Play and re-play your favorite puzzles and mini-games to earn a variety of achievements!
Enjoy bonus materials!
Keep an eye out for different collectibles!

  • DirectX: Version 9.0

short_description: It's time to make your choice! In the new game you have to bring Santa to children despite the odds using your wits and the Christmas spirit!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Russian
*languages with full audio support
